fields.name: cdmessage
fields.fieldText:
{!$Label.FlowStyles_Box_Info}

Review your current context definitions for Pricing and Product Discovery. To change them, select "No" under "Keep Defaults" and click "Continue"

Otherwise, just click "Continue"

NOTE: Make sure you have created your source and destination fields before using this tool. Try and use the same API Name and field type for both fields.
